question: Had a doctor visit (Pregnancy Week 29 or/ 7 months 1 week)and my OB mettioned that he found a weak spot at the top of my stomache.This will be my second child.  During my first delivery, my OB a different one) made a comment about my placenta looking very old, which was strange to her since it was my first child.  Would this have anything to do with what my new doctor is saying today?  During this pregnancy I have been diagnosed with diabetes and take insulin.  I have only gained 7 pounds since the beginning of my pregancy.  What does all this mean?
title: Weak Spot at the top of my Stomache/ Placenta?
